Q2.title: Population Density
Q2.labelLeft: I want to be as far away from others as I can
Q2.labelRight: I want to be surrounded by other people

Q3.title: Immigration
Q3.labelLeft: I want to be the only foreigner around
Q3.labelRight: I want to live somewhere with a large community of expats like myself

Q4.title: English Proficiency
Q4.labelLeft: I want to be completely immersed in a language other than English
Q4.labelRight: I should be able to comfortably speak English to a stranger on the street

Q5.title: Cost of Living
Q5.labelLeft: I want to live as cheaply and affordably as possible
Q5.labelRight: I want to live in a wealthy country with luxury prices

Q6.title: Wealth Distribution
Q6.labelLeft: Everyone should get as fair and equal a share of the wealth as possible
Q6.labelRight: People should be free to hold as much wealth as they can earn

Q7.title: Democracy
Q7.labelLeft: A strong unhindered leadership is necessary to get things done
Q7.labelRight: Multiparty elections and checks & balances are the foundation of good government

Q8.title: Military Forces
Q8.labelLeft: Peace and disarmament are the world's best path forward
Q8.labelRight: A strong military is the best way to guarantee security

Q9.title: the Internet
Q9.labelLeft: I want an excuse to unplug as much as I can
Q9.labelRight: I need the strongest, fastest connection everywhere I go

Q10.title: Motor Vehicles
Q10.labelLeft: Cars and trucks are destroying the planet. @&#$ Cars!
Q10.labelRight: Cars and trucks provide me the freedom to get where I need to go on my terms

Q11.title: Eating Meat
Q11.labelLeft: I want to eat less meat (or none at all)
Q11.labelRight: Meat is a significant portion of my diet
